leave_type = #{leaveType},
title = #{title},
begin_time = #{beginTime},
reason = #{reason},
order_no = #{orderNo},
end_time = #{endTime},
status = #{status},
img = #{img},
date_type = #{dateType},

UPDATE leave_audit
auditor = #{auditor},
status = #{status},
reason = #{reason},
`time` = #{time},
WHERE leave_id = #{leaveId} AND `type` = #{type}
